item.title: Cloudflare Launching AI Miniseries for Developers (and Everyone Else They Know)
item.description: Ã°ÂŸÂšÂ€ Cloudflare has launched “AI Avenue,” a miniseries designed to demystify AI for developers and the general public. Each episode explores AI’s growth, capabilities, and human augmentation stories, making the technology approachable and engaging. Viewers can interact with AI hands-on, breaking down fears and showcasing its potential. Join the journey to learn more at aiavenue.show! #AI #Cloudflare #Innovation #Technology #HumanAugmentation

item.title: Do any CISOs feel lucky?
item.description: Cybersecurity events like the RSA Conference and “Hacker Summer Camp” in Vegas are crucial for industry leaders. This year, CISOs expressed heightened concerns over nation-state threats and the impact of AI on security. Key discussions included resilience and anti-fragility in cybersecurity, with panels addressing AIÃ¢Â€Â™s role in enterprise threats. Informal settings also allowed for deeper conversations among CISOs about the practical use of AI and data protection challenges. #Cybersecurity…
